483.name: Mama Mega!

515.name: Mystery Gift

519.name: Lil Delirium

534.text: Can carry 2 active items instead of 1

535.name: Blanket
535.text: 1-hit shield when entering a Boss Room

536.name: Sacrificial Altar
536.text: Sacrifice up to 2 familiars, spawns a passive Devil Room item for each one, single use

537.name: Lil Spewer
537.text: Familiar, charged attack that spawns creep, changes form on pill use, spawns a random pill on pickup

538.name: Marbles
538.text: Chance to smelt a trinket on hit, spawns 3 random trinkets on pickup

539.name: Mystery Egg
539.text: Familiar, spawns a charmed enemy on hit

540.name: Flat Stone
540.text: Bouncing tears (tears bounce on the ground, 0.25x splash dmg)

541.name: Marrow
541.text: +1 bone heart, spawns 3 red hearts on pickup

542.name: Slipped Rib
542.text: Orbital, reflects enemy projectiles, does no contact damage

543.name: Hallowed Ground
543.text: Spawns a white poop on hit (makes an aura that halves tear delay + 1.25 dmg multiplier + chance to block damage)

544.name: Pointy Rib
544.text: Familiar, bobs back and forth (1x contact dmg)

545.name: Book of the Dead
545.text: Converts killed enemies into temporary orbitals or charmed Bonies

547.name: Divorce Papers
547.text: +1 bone heart, spawns Mysterious Paper on pickup

548.name: Jaw Bone
548.text: Familiar, can grab pickups like a Boomerang

549.name: Brittle Bones
549.text: Removes all red hearts, +6 bone hearts, big bone spash when bone heart is lost

550.name: Broken Shovel
550.text: Used in the Booster Pack #5 quest

551.name: Broken Shovel
551.text: Used in the Booster Pack #5 quest

552.name: Mom's Shovel
552.text: Used in the Booster Pack #5 quest

553.name: Mucormycosis
553.text: Chance to shoot spore tears that stick on enemies and can split into small spore tears

557.name: Fortune Cookie
557.text: Spawns a soul heart / card / fortune teller

558.name: Eye Sore
558.text: Extra tears are fired in random directions

559.name: 120 Volt
559.text: Auto fire lightning arcs at enemies in close proximity

560.name: It Hurts
560.text: Ring of bloody tears + temporary dmg up on hit

561.name: Almond Milk
561.text: Huge tears up, tears gain random worm effects

562.name: Rock Bottom
562.text: Resets all of your stats, stats can't go down

563.name: Nancy Bombs
563.text: +5 bombs, bombs explode with a random effect

566.name: Dream Catcher
566.text: Reveals next boss and treasure room items in level transitions + half soul heart every floor

567.name: Paschal Candle
567.text: -1 tear delay for each room cleared (max 6), resets on hit

568.name: Divine Intervention
568.text: A shield that reflects bullets, brimstone lasers and knock back enemies

569.name: Blood Oath
569.text: Familiar that trades extra red health for damage and speed at the beginning of a floor

570.name: Playdough Cookie
570.text: Random status effect tears (normal/petrify/homing/poison/fear) + random colors to tears

571.name: Orphan Socks
571.text: Immunity from spike and creep damage, can enter Curse Rooms without taking damage

573.name: Immaculate Heart
573.text: Additional set of orbiting spectral tears

575.name: The Intruder
575.text: Add 4 slowing tears, chance to spawn blue spiders and release Intruder familiar on hit

576.name: Dirty Mind
576.text: Dips become friendly, spawns friendly Dips when destroying poop

577.name: Damocles
577.text: Double item pedestals, chance of permanent death on hit

581.name: Psy Fly
581.text: Orbital, reflects enemy projectiles as homing tears

584.name: Book of Virtues
584.text: Spawn a wisp orbital that have the effect of the active item that is inside the book

585.name: Alabaster Box
585.text: Converts soul/black hearts to Angel Room items + random number of soul hearts

586.name: The Stairway
586.text: Start of each floor has ladder to a special Angel Shop

588.name: Sol
588.text: Reveals location of the boss, Sun card effect + active item recharge + 2x dmg + +1 luck + removes curses upon killing the boss

589.name: Luna
589.text: Extra secret and super secret rooms on each floor that contains a blue light beam that gives half a soul heart + tears up for current floor

592.name: Terra
592.text: Rock tears (knockback, can destroy obstacles), random slight dmg up/down on some tears

593.name: Mars
593.text: Double tap to dash, invincible when dashing on enemies

595.name: Saturnus
595.text: Grants orbiting tears aura refreshing per room, can transform enemy tears into friendly tears

596.name: Uranus
596.text: Ice tears (enemies killed will become frozen and can be kicked)

597.name: Neptunus
597.text: Charge an attack that makes you shoot several tears with decreasing fire rate

598.name: Pluto
598.text: -range, size down, can pass between blocks

600.name: Eye Drops
600.text: Tears up only on left eye

601.name: Act of Contrition
601.text: +1 eternal heart, allows Angel Rooms even if a devil deal has been taken

602.name: Member Card
602.text: Every shop has a trapdoor to a special shop

603.name: Battery Pack
603.text: Recharges active item, spawns 3 random batteries on pickup

605.name: The Scooper
605.text: Spawns a temporary familiar similar to The Peeper

606.name: Ocular Rift
606.text: Chance to shoot rift tears (summons rifts that attract + deal contact dmg)

609.name: Eternal D6
609.text: Like a D6, but has a chance to disappear

610.name: Bird Cage
610.text: Spawns bird familiar when hit (similar to Dead Bird) that stomps enemies

612.name: Lost Soul
612.text: Familiar, 1 hit per floor, if it survives it grants a random reward

614.name: Blood Bombs
614.text: Bombs leave behind red creep, can plant bombs for 1/2 heart, heals 4 hearts

615.name: Lil' Dumpy
615.text: Familiar, makes stun/poison farts on hit

616.name: Bird's Eye
616.text: Chance to shoot a big red fire

617.name: Lodestone
617.text: Chance to shoot magnetizing tears (attract enemies + tears + projectiles)

618.name: Rotten Tomato
618.text: Chance to shoot marked tears (other enemies will attack a marked enemy)

621.name: Red Stew
621.text: Full heal, +dmg that wears off over time

623.name: Sharp Key
623.text: Consumes a key and throws it to deal damage / open doors, +5 keys on pickup. Killed enemies have a chance to spawn a chest

625.name: Mega Mush
625.text: Gigantify for a short duration (+damage, -tears, invulnerable, crush rocks/blocks/doors)

626.name: Knife Piece 1
626.text: Collect the pieces to get a knife familiar

627.name: Knife Piece 2
627.text: Collect the pieces to get a knife familiar

629.name: Bot Fly
629.text: Familiar, orbits and fires shielded tears

631.name: Meat Cleaver
631.text: Splits all enemies in the room into 2 smaller versions

635.name: Stitches
635.text: Spawns a temporary familiar, can swap positions with the familiar to deal damage

636.name: R Key
636.text: Restarts the game to the first floor but keeps all items

637.name: Knockout Drops
637.text: Chance to shoot fist tears (knockback + stun), knocking enemies into walls or other enemies damage them

638.name: Eraser
638.text: Throw on an enemy to permanently remove that enemy type from the current run, recharge every floor

640.name: Urn of Souls
640.text: A flamethrower weapon that collects one soul per enemy killed

641.name: Akeldama
641.text: Spawns bloody tears behind the player

642.name: Magic Skin
642.text: Converts 1 red heart / 2 soul hearts to a broken heart, spawns a pedestal item

643.name: Revelation
643.text: Grants flight and an addtional angelic brimstone attack

644.name: Consolation Prize
644.text: +lowest stat, +3 coins or +1 bomb or +1 key (depending on lowest)

645.name: Tinytoma
645.text: Orbital, splits into blue spiders on hit

649.name: Fruity Plum
649.text: Baby Plum familiar that propel itself diagonally by shooting tears

652.name: Cube Baby
652.text: A frozen baby familiar that can be kicked

653.name: Vade Retro
653.text: Spawn a little red ghost for each enemy killed and explodes when another enemy touches it

655.name: Spin to Win
655.text: A spinning familiar, holding use key increase player speed + orbitals spin faster and deal more dmg

658.name: Giant Cell
658.text: Spawn mini Isaacs that follow you when hit

679.name: Lil Abaddon
679.text: Familiar that fires a Maw of the Void ring

680.name: Montezuma's Revenge
680.text: Fires a short diarrhea Brimstone backwards

709.name: Suplex!
709.text: Dash into an enemy, grab it and slam it on the ground

2002.name: Petrified Poop
2002.text: Higher chance for rewards from poops

2004.name: Broken Remote
2004.text: Teleport on active item use, can influence teleport direction based on player's direction

2008.name: Cartridge
2008.text: Chance to get The Gamekid effect on hit

2013.name: Store Credit
2013.text: First shop item you will take while holding the trinket will be free

2014.name: Callus
2014.text: Immunity from spike and creep damage

2015.name: Lucky Rock
2015.text: 33% for rocks to drop coins when broken

2019.name: Paper Clip
2019.text: Can open Golden Chests without using a key

2020.name: Monkey Paw
2020.text: Spawns black hearts when half a heart is remaining

2021.name: Mysterious Paper
2021.text: Copies effect of either A Missing Page, The Polaroid, The Negative, or Missing Poster

2022.name: Daemon's Tail
2022.text: Heart drops are rerolled into either nothing or a black heart

2024.name: Butt Penny
2024.text: Farts upon picking up a coin

2028.name: Broken Ankh
2028.text: 20% chance to respawn as Blue Baby on death

2029.name: Fish Head
2029.text: Spawns a blue fly on hit

2031.name: Push Pin
2031.text: Chance to shoot spectral + piercing tears

2032.name: Liberty Cap
2032.text: Gives a random mushroom effect each room

2033.name: Umbilical Cord
2033.text: Gives Little Steven if damaged to 1/2 hearts, high chance to proc a Gemini for the room when hit

2034.name: Child's Heart
2034.text: Higher chance to find red hearts

2036.name: Rusted Key
2036.text: Higher chance to find keys and chests

2038.name: Mom's Pearl
2038.text: Higher chance to find soul hearts

2040.name: Red Patch
2040.text: Chance to temporarily gain 1.8 dmg on hit

2043.name: Cursed Skull
2043.text: Teleported to previous room if damaged to 1/2 hearts

2046.name: Isaac's Fork
2046.text: Chance to heal for a 1/2 heart after clearing a room

2048.name: A Missing Page
2048.text: Chance to do Necronomicon effect on hit

2049.name: Bloody Penny
2049.text: 25% chance to spawn a 1/2 red heart upon picking up a coin

2050.name: Burnt Penny
2050.text: 25% chance to spawn a bomb upon picking up a coin

2051.name: Flat Penny
2051.text: 25% chance to spawns a key upon picking up a coin

2052.name: Counterfeit Penny
2052.text: 50% chance to gain an extra cent upon picking up a coin

2053.name: Tick
2053.text: Automatically deals 15% damage to each boss, heals 1 red heart, cannot drop

2055.name: Maggy's Faith
2055.text: Gives an eternal heart at the beginning of every floor

2056.name: Judas' Tongue
2056.text: Devil deal items that cost 2 hearts are reduced to 1 heart

2058.name: Samson's Lock
2058.text: Chance to temporarily gain 0.5 dmg when killing an enemy

2059.name: Cain's Eye
2059.text: 25% chance to gain The Compass effect at the beginning of every floor

2060.name: Eve's Bird Foot
2060.text: Chance to spawn a Dead Bird familiar when killing an enemy (2 dmg / tick)

2062.name: Shiny Rock
2062.text: Tinted rocks and crawlspace rocks will flash white every 10 seconds

2063.text: Turns all troll bombs into bomb pickups
2063.name: Safety Scissors

2064.name: Rainbow Worm
2064.text: Rainbow worm tears (a random worm effect every 5 seconds)

2067.name: Cracked Dice
2067.text: Randomly D6, D20, D8, or D12 on hit

2068.name: Super Magnet
2068.text: Pickups and enemies move towards you

2069.name: Faded Polaroid
2069.text: Chnace to gain camouflage for a few seconds (confuses all enemies)

2070.name: Louse
2070.text: Change to spawn a blue spider when in a room with enemies

2072.name: Watch Battery
2072.text: Increased chance to find batteries, chance to add an extra charge after clearing a room

2073.name: Blasting Cap
2073.text: Exploding bombs have a chance to drop another bomb pickup

2074.name: Stud Finder
2074.text: Increased chance to find crawlspaces when breaking rocks

2075.name: Error
2075.text: Gives a random trinket effect per room

2076.name: Poker Chip
2076.text: Chests now have a 50/50 chance to give extra pickups or have nothing

2078.name: Second Hand
2078.text: Increases the time that status effects stay on enemies

2079.name: Endless Nameless
2079.text: Chance to drop an extra copy of a card/pill upon use

2082.name: Golden Horse Shoe
2082.text: +15% chance to get a double Treasure Room

2084.name: Rib of Greed
2084.text: Greed and Super Greed can no longer appear

2085.name: Karma
2085.text: Chance to heal a red heart or spawn a Beggar when using a Donation Machine

2086.name: Lil Larva
2086.text: Gives a blue fly upon destroying a poop

2087.name: Mom's Locket
2087.text: Changes all 1/2 red hearts into full hearts, heals 1/2 heart when a key is used

2093.name: Used Diaper
2093.text: Gives Skatole effect in certain rooms

2095.name: Black Tooth
2095.text: Chance to shoot black tooth tears (2x dmg + poison)

2097.name: Tonsil
2097.text: Chance to spawn tonsil familiar on hit

2098.name: Nose Goblin
2098.text: Chance to shoot booger tears (dmg over time for 60 seconds)

2099.name: Super Ball
2099.text: Chance to shoot bouncy tears (tears bounce off rocks/walls)

2100.name: Vibrant Bulb
2100.text: +0.25 speed, +0.75 range, +0.1 shot speed, +0.2 tears, +0.5 damage, +1 luck when active item is fully charged

2101.name: Dim Bulb
2101.text: +0.5 speed, +1.5 range, +0.3 shot speed, +0.4 tears, +1.5 damage when active item is completely uncharged

2103.name: Equality!
2103.text: Half pickups turn into doubled pickups when same # of coins + bombs + keys

2104.name: Wish Bone
2104.text: Chance to spawn pedestal item on hit

2105.name: Bag Lunch
2105.text: Chance to spawn Lunch on hit

2107.name: Crow Heart
2107.text: Red heart containers are depleted first

2108.name: Walnut
2108.text: Chance to break and drop random coin/heart/key/trinket on hit from explosion

2110.name: Silver Dollar
2110.text: Shops will appear on the Womb

2111.name: Bloody Crown
2111.text: Treasure Rooms will appear on the Womb

2112.name: Pay To Win
2112.text: Restock Machines will always spawn in Treasure Rooms

2113.name: Locust of Wrath
2113.text: Spawns a Red (exploding) Locust upon entering a room

2114.name: Locust of Pestilence
2114.text: Spawns a Green (poison) Locust upon entering a room

2115.name: Locust of Famine
2115.text: Spawns a Yellow (slowing) Locust upon entering a room

2116.name: Locust of Death
2116.text: Spawns a Black (4x dmg) Locust upon entering a room

2117.name: Locust of Conquest
2117.text: Spawns 2-5 White Locusts upon entering a room

2118.name: Bat Wing
2118.text: Chance to gain flight when killing an enemy

2119.name: Stem Cell
2119.text: Heals for 1/2 heart when travelling to the next floor

2120.name: Hairpin
2120.text: Fully recharges active item at the start of each boss

2121.name: Wooden Cross
2121.text: Gives 1-hit shield at the start of each floor

2122.name: Butter!
2122.text: Using active items drops them on the ground, chance to drop passive items on hit

2123.name: Filigree Feather
2123.text: Angels will drop Angel Room items instead of key pieces

2124.name: Door Stop
2124.text: Doors that you go through stay open

2125.name: Extension Cord
2125.text: Yellow laser chain flows through familiars

2126.name: Rotten Penny
2126.text: +1 blue fly upon picking up a coin

2128.name: Finger Bone
2128.text: 5% chance to gain a bone heart on hit

2130.name: Chewed Pen
2130.text: Tears have a chance to slow enemies

2131.name: Blessed Penny
2131.text: Chance to spawn half a soul heart when picking up a coin

2132.name: Broken Syringe
2132.text: Gives you a random syringe effect every room

2133.name: Short Fuse
2133.text: All bombs have a shorter fuse time

2134.name: Gigante Bean
2134.text: Farts from isaac and familars are larger

2135.name: A Lighter
2135.text: Chance for enemies to burn when entering a room

2137.name: Myosotis
2137.text: Get max 8 pickups from the previous floor at the beginning of the new floor

2138.name: 'M
2138.text: Reroll your active item upon use

2139.name: Teardrop Charm
2139.text: Tear-based effects have an extra chance of occurring

2142.name: Beth's Faith
2142.text: Spawn four wisps at the start of each floor

2143.name: Old Capacitor
2143.text: Your active item don't charge but you have a chance to spawn an extra battery drop on room clear

2144.name: Brain Worm
2144.text: Missed tears will redirect themselves toward enemies

2146.name: Devil's Crown
2146.text: Treasure rooms are replaced with Devil Deals

2147.name: Charged Penny
2147.text: Chance to replenish 1 bar of charge when picking up pennies

2163.name: Dingle Berry
2163.text: Spawns a charmed Dip on room clear

2166.name: Modeling Clay
2166.text: Chance of giving you a random passive item each room until room clear

2179.name: RC Remote
2179.text: Familiars are now controlled like Jacob&Esau
